text: The Extra Systems engineering team welcomes you! They ask you to pick a ship.
The other fleet appears to have modified some of their ships with extra systems. They can be scanned through a small change to how a comms link is initialized.

script:
$esrHasDrawnTextForOmega = true 0
FireBest TriggerAutomatedDefenses
$player.esrScanFleetOnCommsLinkOpen = true 0
AddText "The sensors tell you that there are extra systems present on whatever those things are, and that most of them appear to be subsumed alpha, beta and gamma-level AI cores. The sensors don't explain why you can hear the subsumed AI cores crying, or why it almost sounds like music."
Highlight "extra systems" "crying"
ESScanOmegas

$esrHasDrawnTextForZigg = true 0
FireBest BeginFleetEncounter2
AddText "Your sensor lead informs you that, whatever that thing is, it has the trace signature of some kind of extra systems modifications. They can be scanned through a small change to how a comms link is initialized."
Highlight "extra systems modifications"
$player.esrScanFleetOnCommsLinkOpen = true 0

text: The extra systems modifications can be scanned before the communications link is fully established.

script: AddOption 1 ESScanFleet "Scan the other fleet for extra system modifications."
AddOption 99 ESOpenCommsLink "Continue opening the comms link."

text: Upon closer inspection, the derelict appears to have signs of extra systems modifications.
options: 11:ESScanDerelict:Scan the derelict for extra systems modifications.
15:ESScanDebrisField:Scan the debris field for extra systems modifications.
